alert.note: Alert for Niihau in Kauai (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 28 at 4:53PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM HST THIS EVENING FOR THE ISLAND OF KAUAI IN KAUAI COUNTY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...The island of Kauai in Kauai County. * WHEN...Until 800 PM HST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding on roads, poor drainage areas, and in streams. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 450 PM HST, radar indicated showers moving over interior and eastern Kauai with the heaviest rain falling at rates up to 2 inches per hour. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lihue, Kapaa, Kalaheo, Princeville, Kilauea, North Fork Wailua Trails, Wailua Homesteads, Wailua, Hanalei, Omao, Lawai, Alakai Swamp Trails, Koloa, Wainiha, Anahola, Moloaa, Poipu, Haena, Hanapepe and Kokee State Park. This advisory may need to be extended beyond 800 PM HST if flooding persists.
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, drainage ditches and low lying areas prone to flooding.
